recommendations: SAMEER MATHUR “I am a professor at IIM Lucknow. I am happy to endorse Nivedha R.M – an extremely talented and competent student, who has successfully completed a 4-week internship in Marketing Management under my guidance. During this internship, we addressed the following issues: 1) Learnt how to improve their presentation skills. 2) Learnt the basic concepts of Marketing Management. 3) Learnt to apply these basic concepts of Marketing to solve Harvard Business School case studies. 4) Created a Marketing Plan for a new Android App.”

volunteer_experience.info: Co-founded Sparsh Trust in 2013 along with 7 other members.The organisation has grown t establish it base in Bangalore and Trichy.the flagship programme being the Summer Internship during the months of Summer where around 100-200 volunteers across 25+ states in India are selected and guided to work on various campaigns designed by Sparsh.We organise campaigns throughout the year and have witnessed masses from different sectors of the society joining in

volunteer_experience.title: President

activity.title: When dreams become a reality… I truly believe in the power of collaboration and innovation. The past few months have been an exciting journey…
After a super successful launch and operations of one of the biggest automated material recovery facility in the country by our Honorable Dy Chief…
I had the opportunity to be one of the jury members at FKCCI's Manthan event, which saw hundreds of student-run businesses from colleges across…
Years of hardwork, toil and most importantly, not giving up despite hundreds of moments of despair and your blessings and love led us to this…
